scripts.postbuild: rm -rf webflow_output && mkdir -p webflow_output/assets && cp -R dist/. webflow_output/assets/ && cp -f index.js webflow_output/index.js && cp -f index.js dist/index.js && if [ -d /output ]; then mkdir -p /output/assets && cp -R dist/. /output/assets/ && cp -f index.js /output/index.js; fi
scripts.build:webflow: npm run sync:webflow:docs && if [ -f clouduser.astro.config.mjs ]; then astro build --config clouduser.astro.config.mjs; else astro build; fi
